org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine
Class AeDelegatingHandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.AeDelegatingHandlerFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeDelegatingInvokeHandlerFactory, AeDelegatingReceiveHandlerFactory, AeDelegatingWebServiceDeployer
public class AeDelegatingHandlerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract handler factory that delegates to other factories based on the protocol in the URN.

Field Summary
private static java.lang.String DEFAULT_PROTOCOL
          default protocol to use if none specified in the invokerHandler
